name: Free Dictionary
author: Baris Efe

sections.description:
Free Dictionary Sidebar Widget for WordPress provides an English Dictionary that gives you English definitions, synonyms, pronunciation, spelling and more.

Visit http://www.freedictionary.org/external/wordpress/ for more information.
sections.installation:
Just like any other sidebar widget:

  1. Upload free-dictionary-org.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place the Free Dictionary widget in your sidebar
  4. Write plugin settings
  5. See it on your sidebar
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Just like any other sidebar widget:

  1. Upload free-dictionary-org.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place the Free Dictionary widget in your sidebar
  4. Write plugin settings
  5. See it on your sidebar
